mapper.sql: id, ku_id, inGood_id, number, create_user, create_time,type
mapper.select: select glr.id, glr.ku_id kuId, glr.inGood_id inGoodId, glr.number, glr.create_user createUser, glr.create_time createTime,glr.type from goods_location_record glr left join warehouse_goods wg on wg.id = glr.inGood_id where wg.id = #{id} and wg.sku = #{sku} and wg.order_id = #{orderId} order by createTime asc
